message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today.  I think it would be incredibly useful for you and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.  I'm asking $22,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $22,000 is out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $12,000 is quite a bit lower than I hoped for. Could you meet me halfway at $17,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $17,000 is a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $14,000. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
